column4: Hello again :) I hade a question, i run a AMD Athlon 64+ wich ATI driver shuld i use? the x86 or x86_64? And shuld i use XFree86 or X.Org ?

(My Englisch is not good) How can i Mount a shared mapp from another computer? In Suse i write: mount -o password="XxX" //192.168.x.x/"shared" /windows/share . But this dosent work in ubunto. Can somone help me?
